label: 鶴の林
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: An epithet applied to the grove of sal trees where Sakyamuni is reputed to have entered nirvana.  The trees are said to have turned white as cranes.↓[HW: Also refers to nirvana or death.]
